scripts.posttest: npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate
scripts.test:full-report: npm run clean-reports && cypress run --record=false --spec 'cypress/e2e/**/*.cy.js' && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate-timestamped
scripts.test:timestamped: npm run clean-reports && cypress run --record=false --spec 'cypress/e2e/**/*.cy.js' && npm run report:merge && npm run report:generate-timestamped && npm run report:index
scripts.report:generate-timestamped: node -e "const now = new Date(); const timestamp = now.toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-').slice(0, -5); const date = now.toISOString().split('T')[0]; require('fs').mkdirSync('cypress/reports/' + date, { recursive: true }); require('child_process').execSync('marge cypress/reports/report.json --reportDir cypress/reports/' + date + ' --assetsDir cypress/reports/' + date + '/assets --reportFilename report-' + timestamp + '.html'); console.log('Reporte generado: cypress/reports/' + date + '/report-' + timestamp + '.html');"
scripts.clean-reports: if exist cypress\reports\mocha\*.json del cypress\reports\mocha\*.json && if exist cypress\reports\report.json del cypress\reports\report.json
scripts.docs:sync: npm run report:index && npm run report:sync-docs
